QuestData.Title: Cave Medicine
QuestData.Description: It's good to see a friendly face. Might be the last one I see.$B$BOne of those jormungar stung me with some sort of toxin before I managed to get away. I can feel my whole body getting numb, mon.$B$BI'm going to need a toxin gland to make an antidote. I will also need some of the cave mushrooms that grow here... they'll slow the toxin down.$B$BHurry, please. I don't have much time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tracker Val'zij, at Gimorak's Den, wants you to obtain 1 Jormungar Toxin Gland and 8 Cave Mushrooms.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, mon. I might live another day now.
